memberdef.argsstring: (GntTree *tree, int pos, int y, chtype type)
memberdef.name: tree_mark_columns

memberdef.argsstring: (GntWidget *widget, GntMouseEvent event, int x, int y)
memberdef.name: gnt_tree_clicked

detaileddescription.para: Create a tree with one column.
The number of rows the tree should display at a time.
Get the number visible rows.
Returns the list of rows in the tree.

simplesect.para: The list of the rows. The list should not be modified by the caller.

detaileddescription.para: Scroll the contents of the tree.

parameterdescription.para: If positive, the tree will be scrolled down by count rows, otherwise, it will be scrolled up by count rows.

detaileddescription.para: Insert a row in the tree.

parameterdescription.para: The key for the parent row
The key for the row to insert the new row after.

detaileddescription.para: Insert a row at the end of the tree.

parameterdescription.para: The key for the parent row

detaileddescription.para: Get the key for the selected row.

simplesect.para: The key for the selected row

detaileddescription.para: Get the text displayed for the selected row.

simplesect.para: The text, which needs to be freed by the caller

detaileddescription.para: Get a list of text for a row.

parameterdescription.para: A key corresponding to the row in question. If key is NULL, the text list for the selected row will be returned.

simplesect.para: A list of texts of a row. The list and its data should be freed by the caller. The caller should make sure that if any column of the tree contains binary data, it's not freed.

detaileddescription.para: Get a list of text of the current row.

simplesect.para: A list of texts of the currently selected row. The list and its data should be freed by the caller. The caller should make sure that if any column of the tree contains binary data, it's not freed.

detaileddescription.para: Remove a row from the tree.

parameterdescription.para: The key for the row to remove

detaileddescription.para: Remove all the item from the tree.
Get the visible line number of the selected row.

simplesect.para: The line number of the currently selected row

memberdef.argsstring: (GntTree *tree, gpointer key, int colno, const char *text)
memberdef.name: gnt_tree_change_text

detaileddescription.para: Change the text of a column in a row.
Add a checkable item in the tree.

parameterdescription.para: The parent of the row, or NULL
The row to insert after, or NULL

detaileddescription.para: Set whether a checkable item is checked or not.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the item should be checked, FALSE if not

detaileddescription.para: Return whether a row is selected or not, where the row is a checkable item.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the row is checked, FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Set flags for the text in a row in the tree.
Set color for the text in a row in the tree.
Select a row.

parameterdescription.para: The key of the row to select

detaileddescription.para: Create a tree with a specified number of columns.
Create a row from a list of text.

parameterdescription.para: The list containing the text for each column

detaileddescription.para: Create a row to insert in the tree.

parameterdescription.para: A string for each column in the tree

detaileddescription.para: Set the width of a column in the tree.
Set the title for a column.
Set the titles of the columns

parameterdescription.para: One title for each column in the tree

detaileddescription.para: Set whether to display the title of the columns.

parameterdescription.para: IfTRUE, the column titles are displayed

detaileddescription.para: Set the compare function for sorting the data.

parameterdescription.para: The comparison function, which is used to compare the keys

detaileddescription.para: Set whether a row, which has child rows, should be expanded.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to expand the child rows

detaileddescription.para: Set whether to show column separators.

parameterdescription.para: IfTRUE, the column separators are displayed

detaileddescription.para: Automatically adjust the width of the columns in the tree.

memberdef.argsstring: (GntTree *tree, gpointer hash, gpointer eq, gpointer kd)
memberdef.name: gnt_tree_set_hash_fns

detaileddescription.para: Set the hash functions to use to hash, compare and free the keys.

parameterdescription.para: The function to use to free the keys when a row is removed from the tree

memberdef.argsstring: (GntTree *tree, int col, GntTreeColumnFlag flag, gboolean set)
memberdef.name: set_column_flag

detaileddescription.para: Set whether a column is visible or not. This can be useful when, for example, we want to store some data which we don't want/need to display.

parameterdescription.para: IfFALSE, the column will not be displayed

detaileddescription.para: Set whether a column can be resized to keep the same ratio when the tree is resized.

parameterdescription.para: IfFALSE, the column will not be resized when the tree is resized

detaileddescription.para: Set whether data in a column should be considered as binary data, and not as strings. A column containing binary data will be display empty text.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the data for the column is binary

detaileddescription.para: Set whether text in a column should be right-aligned.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the text in the column should be right aligned

detaileddescription.para: Set column widths to use when calculating column widths after a tree is resized.

parameterdescription.para: Array of widths. The width must have the same number of entries as the number of columns in the tree, or end with a negative value for a column-width.

detaileddescription.para: Set the column to use for typeahead searching.
Check whether the user is currently in the middle of a search.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the user is searching, FALSE otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (GntTree *tree, gboolean(*func)(GntTree *tree, gpointer key, const char *search, const char *current))
memberdef.name: gnt_tree_set_search_function

param.type: gboolean(*)( GntTree *tree, gpointer key, const char *search, const char *current)

detaileddescription.para: Set a custom search function.

parameterdescription.para: The custom search function. The search function is sent the tree itself, the key of a row, the search string and the content of row in the search column. If the function returnsTRUE, the row is dislayed, otherwise it's not.

detaileddescription.para: Get the parent key for a row.

simplesect.para: The key of the parent row.

detaileddescription.para: Get the key of a row.
Get the next row.
Get the previous row.
Get the child row.
Get the parent row.

tree-> priv->
search_timeout
=
g_timeout_add_seconds( SEARCH_TIMEOUT_S, search_timeout,tree);

search_timeout
=
